prompt: Design a synchronous buck converter using TPS54360B controller. Include 22uH inductor (SRP1265A-220M), SS34 Schottky diode, 22uF input caps, 100uF output caps, and proper feedback network with 49.9k and 10k resistors for 5V output from 12-24V input.

completeness_warnings: No power supply nets found for ICs

prompt: Design a flight computer system with: STM32F405RGT6 processor, BMP280 barometer on I2C, MPU6050 6-axis IMU on I2C, NEO-M8N GPS module on UART, W25Q128 flash for logging on SPI, and AMS1117-3.3 LDO for power. Include all decoupling caps (100nF per IC, 10uF bulk), 8MHz crystal with 20pF load caps, and proper pull-ups on I2C (4.7k).

Design an isolated flyback converter for 5V 2A output from 230VAC mains using TNY290PG controller. Include safety capacitors Y1 (2.2nF) and X2 (100nF), CM choke, fuse, MOV, bridge rectifier (MB10S), opto-isolator (PC817) for feedback, TL431 voltage reference, and transformer with 1:0.1 ratio. Primary inductance 1mH.

prompt: Design a Class-D audio amplifier using TPA3116D2. Include 22uF input coupling caps, 680uF output filter caps, 10uH filter inductors (SLF7045T-100M1R0), LC input filter with 100nF and ferrite bead, PVDD decoupling with 1000uF bulk and 100nF ceramic, and proper bootstrap caps (100nF). Support BTL configuration for 2x50W into 4 ohms.

completeness_warnings: No power supply nets found for ICs

prompt: Design a 4-layer motor driver board with dual DRV8301 gate drivers for 3-phase BLDC control. Include LMZ14201 5V/1A buck for logic power, AS5047P magnetic encoder on SPI, STM32G474 for control with 25MHz HSE crystal, CAN transceiver (SN65HVD230), current sense amplifiers (INA240A2) with 1mOhm shunts, and proper gate drive with 10R gate resistors and TVS protection.

prompt: Design an ESP32-S3 IoT sensor node with: solar charging (CN3065), LiFePO4 battery management, BME680 environmental sensor (I2C), VEML7700 light sensor (I2C), soil moisture sensor interface (ADC), LoRa module (RFM95W on SPI), deep sleep capability, and LED indicators. Include proper voltage regulation (3.3V from battery using TPS63000 buck-boost), reverse polarity protection, and ESD protection on all external interfaces.

prompt: Design a precision ADC front-end for 24-bit ADS1256 with programmable gain amplifier (PGA281), anti-aliasing filter (4th order Butterworth at 1kHz using MCP6004), precision 2.5V reference (REF5025), and low-noise LDO power supply (LP5907-3.3). Include proper grounding with analog/digital separation, decoupling (10uF tantalum + 100nF ceramic per rail), and input protection.
generated_tokn:
# TOKN v1
title: Precision 24-bit ADC Front-End with ADS1256 and PGA281

components[43]{ref,type,value,fp,x,y,w,h,a}:

  U1,LP5907-3.3,3.3V LDO,SOT23-5,20,130,10,10,0
  C1,C,10uF,0805,10,130,5,5,0 # Input bypass
  C2,C,100nF,0402,15,120,5,5,0 # Input bypass
  C3,C,10uF,0805,30,130,5,5,0 # Output bypass
  C4,C,100nF,0402,25,120,5,5,0 # Output bypass
  R1,R,1 Ohm,0603,40,130,5,5,0 # Ferrite bead stand-in for AGND/DGND separation

  # Voltage Reference
  U2,REF5025,2.5V Reference,SOT23-5,50,140,10,10,0
  C5,C,10uF,0805,40,140,5,5,0
  C6,C,100nF,0402,45,150,5,5,0
  C7,C,10uF,0805,60,140,5,5,0
  C8,C,100nF,0402,55,150,5,5,0

  # PGA
  U3,PGA281,PGA281,TSSOP-24,70,90,30,20,0

  C10,C,100nF,0402,75,80,5,5,0
  C11,C,10uF,0805,60,100,5,5,0
  C12,C,100nF,0402,75,100,5,5,0
  R2,R,100k,0603,60,70,5,5,0 # Input Protection
  D1,TVS,SMAJ5.0A,SMA,65,65,5,5,0 # Input Protection
  R3,R,100k,0603,60,110,5,5,0 # Input Protection
  D2,TVS,SMAJ5.0A,SMA,65,115,5,5,0 # Input Protection
  R4,R,100,0402,80,90,5,5,0 # Series resistor for U3OUTP
  R5,R,100,0402,80,100,5,5,0 # Series resistor for U3OUTN

  # Anti-Aliasing Filter (4th order Butterworth, Sallen-Key approx)

  C19,C,10uF,0805,90,105,5,5,0
  C20,C,100nF,0402,95,110,5,5,0

  # ADC
  U6,ADS1256,ADS1256,TSSOP-28,150,90,40,25,0
  C21,C,10uF,0805,140,80,5,5,0
  C22,C,100nF,0402,145,85,5,5,0

  C25,C,18pF,0402,150,65,5,5,0
  C26,C,18pF,0402,160,65,5,5,0

prompt: Design a 6S LiPo battery management system with BQ76940 AFE, external balancing MOSFETs (CSD17575Q3), thermistor inputs (10k NTC), cell voltage sensing with 100nF filtering, charge/discharge FETs (NVMFS6H800NL), pre-charge resistor (100R 5W), and communication via I2C to host MCU. Include proper protection for overvoltage, undervoltage, overcurrent, and overtemperature.
generated_tokn:
# TOKN v1
title: 6S LiPo BMS with BQ76940 and External Balancing

components[50]{ref,type,value,fp,x,y,w,h,a}:
  # BQ76940 AFE
  U1,BQ76940,BQ76940,TSSOP-40,100,150,30,10,0

  # Power Supply and Reference
  R1,R,10k,0603,80,180,7.62,0,90
  C1,C,1uF,0603,70,180,0,7.62,0
  C2,C,100nF,0603,110,180,0,7.62,0

  # Cell Voltage Sensing (6S)
  R2,R,100R,0603,140,200,7.62,0,0
  C3,C,100nF,0603,140,210,0,7.62,0
  R3,R,100R,0603,140,190,7.62,0,0
  C4,C,100nF,0603,140,160,0,7.62,0
  # ... (R4-R7, C5-C8 for cells 2-5)
  R8,R,100R,0603,140,130,7.62,0,0
  C9,C,100nF,0603,140,120,0,7.62,0
  R9,R,100R,0603,140,100,7.62,0,0
  C10,C,100nF,0603,140,90,0,7.62,0
  R10,R,100R,0603,140,80,7.62,0,0
  C11,C,100nF,0603,140,70,0,7.62,0

  # Thermistor Inputs (2x for BQ76940)
  RT1,THERM,10k NTC,0603,120,220,0,7.62,0
  R11,R,10k,0603,120,230,7.62,0,90
  RT2,THERM,10k NTC,0603,130,220,0,7.62,0
  R12,R,10k,0603,130,230,7.62,0,90

  # Current Sense Resistor
  R_SNS,R,1mR,2512,180,150,10,0,0

  # Charge/Discharge FETs
  Q1,NVMFS6H800NL,NPN,PQFN5X6,200,120,10,10,0 ; Discharge FET
  Q2,NVMFS6H800NL,NPN,PQFN5X6,200,100,10,10,0 ; Charge FET
  Q_PC,NVMFS6H800NL,NPN,PQFN5X6,200,140,10,10,0 ; Pre-charge FET
  R_PC,R,100R 5W,SIP-4,220,140,10,0,0 ; Pre-charge resistor

  # FET Gate Drivers (assuming simple pull-down, BQ output directly drives)
  R13,R,10k,0603,190,130,7.62,0,0
  R14,R,10k,0603,190,110,7.62,0,0
  Q3,BSS138,N-FET,SOT23,170,125,7.62,0,0 ; For Charge FET drive
  Q4,BSS138,N-FET,SOT23,170,105,7.62,0,0 ; For Discharge FET drive

  # External Balancing MOSFETs (6 cells)
  QBC1,CSD17575Q3,N-FET,SO8,100,240,7.62,0,0
  RBC1,R,1k,0603,110,240,7.62,0,0
  # ... (QBC2-QBC6, RBC2-RBC6 similar)
  QBC6,CSD17575Q3,N-FET,SO8,100,290,7.62,0,0
  RBC6,R,1k,0603,110,290,7.62,0,0

  # I2C Communication
  J1,CONN_01X04,I2C_HEADER,HDR-1X4,80,100,7.62,0,0
  R15,R,4.7k,0603,90,110,7.62,0,90 ; SDA Pull-up
  R16,R,4.7k,0603,90,120,7.62,0,90 ; SCL Pull-up

  # Cell Connectors
  BatP,CONN_01X01,Batt_Pos,TESTPAD,240,170,5,5,0
  BatN,CONN_01X01,Batt_Neg,TESTPAD,240,110,5,5,0
  JCELL,CONN_01X07,CELL_TAP,HDR-1X7,160,50,7.62,0,0

  # Output Connector
  JOUT,CONN_01X02,Output,HDR-1X2,250,150,7.62,0,0
  AUX,CONN_01X02,AUX_PWR,HDR-1X2,250,130,7.62,0,0

pins{U1}[40]:
  1,VC10
  2,BREG
  3,VC5
  4,VC6
  5,VC7
  6,VC8
  7,VC9
  8,VCAP1
  9,VCAP2
  10,TS1
  11,TS2
  12,SRN
  13,SRP
  14,BAT
  15,VSS
  16,CC1
  17,CC2

  19,ALERT
  20,SDA

  37,REGOUT
  38,ALERT_GPIO
  39,BAL1

  # Note: BQ76940 can balance up to 10 cells, only 6 used here. BAL pins need to be mapped.
  # Assuming BAL1-BAL6 are used for cells 1-6 directly.

nets[45]{name,pins}:
  # Power / Reference
  VBAT,"U1.14,BatP.1,Q1.D,Q2.D,Q_PC.D"
  GND,"U1.15,C1.2,C2.2,C3.2,C4.2,C9.2,C10.2,C11.2,RT1.2,R11.2,RT2.2,R12.2,R_SNS.2,J1.1,JOUT.2,AUX.2"
  VCC-REG,"U1.37,R1.1,C1.1" # BQ Regulated Output

  # Cell Connections
  CELL6_POS,"U1.1,JCELL.7,RBC6.1,QBC6.D"
  CELL5_POS,"U1.4,JCELL.6,RBC5.1,QBC5.D"
  CELL4_POS,"U1.5,JCELL.5,RBC4.1,QBC4.D"
  CELL3_POS,"U1.6,JCELL.4,RBC3.1,QBC3.D"
  CELL2_POS,"U1.7,JCELL.3,RBC2.1,QBC2.D"
  CELL1_POS,"U1.8,JCELL.2,RBC1.1,QBC1.D"
  CELL0_NEG,"U1.26,JCELL.1" # Lowest cell negative

  # Cell Voltage Sensing & Filtering (assuming a daisy-chain approach for filtering)
  VC_Sense_6,"CELL6_POS,R2.1"
  VC_Sense_5,"U1.3,R2.2,C3.1,R3.1"
  VC_Sense_4,"U1.29,R3.2,C4.1,R4.1" # R4, C5 assumed
  VC_Sense_3,"U1.28,R4.2,C5.1,R5.1" # R5, C6 assumed
  VC_Sense_2,"U1.27,R5.2,C6.1,R6.1" # R6, C7 assumed
  VC_Sense_1,"U1.26,R6.2,C7.1,R7.1" # R7, C8 assumed

  CELL_P,"U1.2,C2.1" # VCAP1 for internal Reg

  # Thermistor Inputs
  THERM1_ADC,"U1.10,R11.1,RT1.1"
  THERM2_ADC,"U1.11,R12.1,RT2.1"

  # Current Sense
  SNS_P,"U1.13,R_SNS.1"
  SNS_N,"U1.12,R_SNS.2,BatN.1,Q_PC.S,Q1.S,Q2.S"

  # FET Control
  DRV_DSG,"U1.24,Q4.G,Q1.G"
  DRV_CHG,"U1.23,Q3.G,Q2.G"
  DRV_PRES,"U1.25,Q_PC.G"

  # FET Gate Connections (simplified, assuming BQ can directly drive)
  GATE_DSG,"DRV_DSG" # Add current limiting resistor if needed, e.g., 100R
  GATE_CHG,"DRV_CHG" # Add current limiting resistor if needed
  GATE_PRES,"DRV_PRES"

  # Pre-charge path (simplified for illustration)
  BATT_OUT_N,"SNS_N" # This is the main battery negative after current sense
  CHARGER_OUT_P,"JOUT.1" # Main Positive output
  PRECHARGE_PATH_1,"BatP.1,R_PC.1"
  PRECHARGE_PATH_2,"R_PC.2,Q_PC.D"
  PRECHARGE_PATH_3,"Q_PC.S,BATT_OUT_N" # Simplified, often more complex with Q_PC

  # I2C Communication
  SDA_HOST,"U1.20,J1.2,R15.1"
  SCL_HOST,"U1.21,J1.3,R16.1"
  I2C_VCC,"J1.4,R15.2,R16.2" # Host provides I2C pullup voltage

  # Balancing Connections
  BAL_GATE_1,"U1.39,RBC1.2,QBC1.G"
  BAL_GATE_2,"U1.40,RBC2.2,QBC2.G"
  # ... BAL_GATE_3 to BAL_GATE_6 (assuming BAL3-BAL6 are available on BQ76940, or use external shift registers for more)
  # For 6S, BQ76940 has 5 dedicated BAL pins (BAL1-5), and BQ is often paired with a companion device for more cells.
  # For simplicity, assuming BAL1-6 directly maps for 6 unique cells for balancing.
  # If not, a separate balancing IC or more complex driving mechanism would be needed.
  BAL_CELL1_DRAIN,"QBC1.S"
  BAL_CELL2_DRAIN,"QBC2.S"
  BAL_CELL3_DRAIN,"QBC3.S"
  BAL_CELL4_DRAIN,"QBC4.S"
  BAL_CELL5_DRAIN,"QBC5.S"
  BAL_CELL6_DRAIN,"QBC6.S"
  BAL_CELL1_SRC,"CELL0_NEG"
  BAL_CELL2_SRC,"CELL1_POS"
